name: Sad Jack: Speed Cowboy
description:
Anthony Groce - Audio Wizard
Cresten St.Clair - Programming Sorcerer
Julian Bishop - Art Czar
Michael Schisler - Visual Conjurer
Pride St. Clair - Design Mage

What can we say?  We set out to make a game in a weekend and this is what we did. Sad Jack can, like, move really fast or something and uh, he can move big objects to make a car pingpong around.  This is a proof of concept but we're all very proud of it.  How the hell did this even happen?
